trans-unit.source: PowerShell Engine Improvements in WMF 5.1 (Preview)
trans-unit.target: WMF 5.1 (Preview) 的 PowerShell 引擎改善

trans-unit.source: PowerShell engine improvements
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 引擎改善

trans-unit.source: The following improvements to the core PowerShell engine have been implemented in WMF 5.1:
trans-unit.target: WMF 5.1 已實作核心 PowerShell 引擎的下列改善︰

trans-unit.source: Performance
trans-unit.target: 效能

trans-unit.source: Performance has improved in some important areas:
trans-unit.target: 某些重要區域的效能已改善︰

trans-unit.source: Startup
trans-unit.target: 啟動

trans-unit.source: Pipelining to cmdlets like ForEach-Object and Where-Object is approximately 50% faster
trans-unit.target: 管線到 ForEach-Object 和 Where-Object 等 Cmdlet 大約快了 50%

trans-unit.source: Some example improvements (your results may vary depending your your hardware):
trans-unit.target: 一些改善範例 (結果隨硬體而有不同)：

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: 案例

trans-unit.source: 5.0 Time (ms)
trans-unit.target: 5.0 的時間 (毫秒)

trans-unit.source: 5.1 Time (ms)
trans-unit.target: 5.1 的時間 (毫秒)

trans-unit.source: First ever PowerShell run:
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 首次執行︰

trans-unit.source: Command analysis cache built:
trans-unit.target: 命令分析快取組建︰

trans-unit.source: One change related to startup might impact some unsupported scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 與啟動相關的一項變更，可能影響到某些不受支援的案例。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell no longer reads the files `$pshome\*.ps1xml` - these files have been converted to C# to avoid some file and CPU overhead of processing the XML files.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 不再讀取 `$pshome\*.ps1xml` 檔案，這些檔案已轉換成 C#，以避免處理 XML 檔案的一些檔案和 CPU 負荷。

trans-unit.source: The files still exist to support V2 side-by-side, so if you change the file contents, it will not have any effect to V5, only V2.
trans-unit.target: 這些檔案對 V2 的支援仍然不變，因此，若變更檔案內容，對 V5 沒有任何效果，只對 V2 有效果。

trans-unit.source: Note that changing the contents of these files was never a supported scenario.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，變更這些檔案內容向來是不受支援的案例。

trans-unit.source: Another visible change is how PowerShell caches the exported commands and other information for modules that are installed on a system.
trans-unit.target: 另一個明顯的變更，是 PowerShell 如何快取匯出的命令和安裝在系統上的模組其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: Previous, this cache was stored in the directory `$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Microsoft\Windows\PowerShell\CommandAnalysis`.
trans-unit.target: 以往，此快取儲存於 `$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Microsoft\Windows\PowerShell\CommandAnalysis` 目錄。

trans-unit.source: In WMF 5.1, the cache is a single file `$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Microsoft\Windows\PowerShell\ModuleAnalysisCache`.
trans-unit.target: 在 WMF 5.1，快取是單一的 `$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Microsoft\Windows\PowerShell\ModuleAnalysisCache` 檔案。

trans-unit.source: See [analysis_cache.md]() for more details.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [analysis_cache.md]()。
